title: WE HAVE BECOME THE LAUGHING STOCK OF THE WORLD: ARJUNA
content: Source of News: News First August 19, 2010: Sri Lanka has become the laughing stock of the cricketing world, says former cricket captain Arjuna Ranatunga.
